body_html:
This is still an issue in TF 1.2

To reproduce, the following is enough:

L = 10
values = tf.constant(list(range(L)), dtype=tf.int32)
histo_vals = tf.constant([0, L - 1], dtype=values.dtype)
tf.histogram_fixed_width(values=values, value_range=histo_vals, nbins=L)

body:
This is still an issue in TF 1.2

To reproduce, the following is enough:

    L = 10
    values = tf.constant(list(range(L)), dtype=tf.int32)
    histo_vals = tf.constant([0, L - 1], dtype=values.dtype)
    tf.histogram_fixed_width(values=values, value_range=histo_vals, nbins=L)
